title: Santana e Vasconcelos (Manuel de)
body:
He was born in Funchal in 1798 and died in this city on February 23, 1851. He held the position of council administrator and wrote:

*Clamor aos madeirenses* (Lisbon, 1835) and *Revista histórica do proselitismo anti-catholico na ilha Madeira pelo dr. Roberto Reid Kalley, medico escocez, desde 1838 até hoje* (Funchal, 1845).
